node.title: What You Don't Know CAN Hurt You!
node.description: There are few things more insidious – and truly dangerous – than deception. But our natural hearts are “desperately wicked, and deceitful above all things” according to the wise man. How can we know that we are not deceived? How can we know our true selves? In this message Pastor Clark shares four ways that we can, with God’s help, come to know ourselves better. Remember, there are only two things that we really need to know in order to be saved!
